# DSPy 日本語ドキュメント

> The framework for programming—rather than prompting—language models.

DSPy is the framework for programming—rather than prompting—language models. DSPy unifies techniques for prompting, fine-tuning, reasoning, tool use, and evaluation of LMs. It provides a systematic approach to building AI applications through composable modules,  optimization techniques, and evaluation frameworks.


## Getting Started

- [Get Started](https://atynagano.github.io/dspy-japanese/index.md): DSPy overview and quick start guide
- [Cheatsheet](https://atynagano.github.io/dspy-japanese/cheatsheet/index.md): DSPy cheatsheet for quick reference

## Core Concepts

- [Programming Overview](https://atynagano.github.io/dspy-japanese/learn/programming/overview/index.md): Programming paradigm and philosophy
- [Signatures](https://atynagano.github.io/dspy-japanese/learn/programming/signatures/index.md): Signatures - declarative input/output specifications
- [Modules](https://atynagano.github.io/dspy-japanese/learn/programming/modules/index.md): Modules - composable AI components
- [Language Models](https://atynagano.github.io/dspy-japanese/learn/programming/language_models/index.md): Language model interfaces and configuration

## Essential Tutorials

- [Retrieval-Augmented Generation (RAG)](https://atynagano.github.io/dspy-japanese/tutorials/rag/index.md): Retrieval-Augmented Generation (RAG) tutorial
- [Classification](https://atynagano.github.io/dspy-japanese/tutorials/classification/index.md): Classification with DSPy
- [Building RAG as Agent](https://atynagano.github.io/dspy-japanese/tutorials/agents/index.md): Building AI agents with DSPy

## Optimization

- [Optimization Overview](https://atynagano.github.io/dspy-japanese/learn/optimization/overview/index.md): Optimization techniques overview
- [Overview](https://atynagano.github.io/dspy-japanese/tutorials/optimize_ai_program/index.md): Guide to optimizing AI programs
- [BootstrapFewShot](https://atynagano.github.io/dspy-japanese/api/optimizers/BootstrapFewShot/index.md): Bootstrap few-shot optimizer

## Key Modules API

- [Predict](https://atynagano.github.io/dspy-japanese/api/modules/Predict/index.md): Basic prediction module
- [ChainOfThought](https://atynagano.github.io/dspy-japanese/api/modules/ChainOfThought/index.md): Chain of thought reasoning
- [ReAct](https://atynagano.github.io/dspy-japanese/api/modules/ReAct/index.md): ReAct agent module

## Core API Reference

- [Signature](https://atynagano.github.io/dspy-japanese/api/signatures/Signature/index.md): Signature system documentation
- [Example](https://atynagano.github.io/dspy-japanese/api/primitives/Example/index.md): Example primitive for training data

## Production

- [Deployment](https://atynagano.github.io/dspy-japanese/tutorials/deployment/index.md): Production deployment guide
- [Debugging & Observability](https://atynagano.github.io/dspy-japanese/tutorials/observability/index.md): Debugging and observability
